title: Chocolate Coffee Cake
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '400g caster sugar', '55g unsweetened cocoa powder', '120ml vegetable oil', '2 eggs', '225ml buttermilk', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 tablespoon instant coffee granules', '225ml hot water']
